title: Muscle Fibroblasts and Stem Cells Stimulate Motor Neurons in An Age and Exercise-Dependent Manner
details: C Soendenbroe, P Schjerling, CJL Bechshoeft… - bioRxiv, 2024
abstract: Exercise preserves neuromuscular function in ageing through unknown mechanisms. Skeletal muscle fibroblasts (FIB) and stem cells (MuSC) are abundant in skeletal muscle and reside close to neuromuscular junctions, but their relative …
